name: svelte-presistent-store

> A pesistent store for svelte based on svelte/store ### üè† [Homepage](https://github.com/GagnDeep/svelte-presistent-store) ### ‚ú® [Demo](https://codesandbox.io/s/github/GagnDeep/svelte-presistent-store) ## Install ```sh npm i svelte-presistent-store ``` ## Usage ```sh npm run start ``` ```javascript import { writable } from "svelte-presistent-store"; const store = writable("any-key", inititalStore); ``` ## Author üë§ **gagandeep singh** - Github: [@GagnDeep](https://github.com/GagnDeep) ## Show your support Give a ‚≠êÔ∏è if this project helped you! --- _This README was generated with ‚ù§Ô∏è by [readme-md-generator](https://github.com/kefranabg/readme-md-generator)_
